mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_nick, user_phone, user_email1, user_email2, addr_mine, addr_close) VALUES(#{userId},#{userPw},#{userName}, #{userNick}, #{userPhone},#{userEmail1}, #{userEmail2},#{addrMine},#{addrClose})
mapper.select: SELECT user_name, user_phone, user_email1, user_email2, addr_mine, addr_close, user_point, p.party_board_no, p.title, p.reg_date FROM users u LEFT JOIN party p ON u.user_id = p.writer WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.party_board_no DESC LIMIT #{paging.pageStart}, #{paging.cpp}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET user_pw = #{userPw}, user_name = #{userName}, user_email1 = #{userEmail1}, user_email2 = #{userEmail2}, user_phone = #{userPhone}, addr_mine = #{addrMine}, addr_close = #{addrClose}, WHERE user_id=#{userId}
